section:
Class List Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:EAR::Communication::Configuration
Configuration class storing endpoint attributes EAR::IO::Device
Base class for devices performing I/O operations EAR::Communication::Endpoint
Class Endpoint EAR::Schedule::ITask
Task interface that is used by internal classes, not for developers EAR::Communication::Message
Message type EAR::Communication::NetworkManager
Network manager class that storing and conduction two types of endpoints EAR::Communication::Receiver
Receiver endpoint class EAR::Schedule::SchedulerEAR::Schedule::Task
Class Task implements Task interface EAR::Communication::Transmitter
Transmitter endpoint class
